summary: The bill, the IDEA Full Funding Act, aims to fully fund Part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA). It amends Section 611(i) of the IDEA to authorize and appropriate increasing amounts of funding for special education, starting from fiscal year 2026.  The amount appropriated is calculated using a formula based on the number of children with disabilities receiving special education and related services and the average per-pupil expenditure. The bill also includes guidelines regarding the availability of funds for obligation.
